H0.text: i was a great islamic scholar and mathematician who died in 1131 ce. Al-Biruni

H1.text: i was a great islamic scholar and mathematician who died in 1131 ce. Ibn Sina

H2.text: i was a great islamic scholar and mathematician who died in 1131 ce. Ibn Yunus

H3.text: i was a great islamic scholar and mathematician who died in 1131 ce. Omar Khayyam

A4.text: Omar Khayyam died at the age of 83 in his hometown of Nishapur on 4 December 1131

A5.text: The various biographical extracts referring to Omar Khayyam describe him as unequalled in scientific knowledge and achievement during his time
